tip.tipsmod.animal_growing.text: You can craft an antique atlas to open your world map to track where you've been.
tip.tipsmod.arthropods.text: Mythril plating can increase your reinforcement level to a maximum of two.
tip.tipsmod.axolotl_food.text: Backpacks allow for storing and transportation of lots of items at once.
tip.tipsmod.azalea_caves.text: Enchantments are limited to a max of tier III.
tip.tipsmod.baby_panda_slimeball.text: Lembas bread is the most filling food in the game. One small bite can fill the stomach of a grown man!
tip.tipsmod.barrel.text: Soul forges can be used to make your equipment unbreakable, but at a hefty cost.
tip.tipsmod.bed_explode.text: Sleeping now speeds up time, allowing for faster smelting and crop growing.
tip.tipsmod.bed_respawn.text: Sawmills and stonecutters can be used to craft wood and stone blocks for efficiently.
tip.tipsmod.biome_bonemeal.text: Ashen Steel can be used to craft higher tiers of armor, in place of iron.
tip.tipsmod.biome_fishing.text: A shade will appear at your last site of death, kill it to get your items back.
tip.tipsmod.blaze_fuel.text: Ancient fangs can be found in buried treasure, and can be used to craft tridents.
tip.tipsmod.blaze_snowball.text: Enchantment guides are only found in the most ancient of cities.
tip.tipsmod.boat_passenger.text: Mythril is the most precious metal in the world. As light as a feather, and as hard and dragon scales.
tip.tipsmod.bucket_friends.text: Tamed creatures and beasts can fight for you in battle.
tip.tipsmod.bucket_rename.text: Typically, the faster the weapon, the shorter the reach it provides.
tip.tipsmod.coarse_to_dirt.text: Compasses, altimeters, clocks, and atlases will provide all the information you need about where you are in the world.
tip.tipsmod.compass_spawn.text: Heart crystals can be found in caverns, find enough fragments and you can get another permanent heart.
tip.tipsmod.cooked_drops.text: You are the Valcon Knight. You will serve your gods well.
tip.tipsmod.creeper_cat.text: Cupid arrows can be used to breed animals free of charge.
tip.tipsmod.creeper_drops_disc.text: There are rumours of precious materials being found below fairy rings in plains and forests.
tip.tipsmod.crouch_blocks.text: Forged out of lead, crucial bolts can be use to enhance a crossbow's damage.
tip.tipsmod.dog_health.text: Time your block well to parry and retaliate against your enemies!
tip.tipsmod.dog_rotten_flesh.text: The elytra has been returned to the void, where it belongs.
tip.tipsmod.dripstone_lava.text: The Abyssal Seas and Netherrealm are dangerous dimensions with many deadly creatures, prepare well!
tip.tipsmod.elytra_boost.text: Quivers and rune pouches can be used to store items used for archery and spells.
tip.tipsmod.end_dimension.text: Sometimes you can find bridges littered across the world. Who knows who built them?
tip.tipsmod.enderman_blocks.text: Drown your woes in beer! Or other drinks, if that's your thing.
tip.tipsmod.enderman_projectiles.text: Your spawn point will always land in a plains biome.
tip.tipsmod.enderman_pumpkin.text: The Nameless King is a fast and powerful shardbearer, stun them to get a lot of damage in at once.
tip.tipsmod.enderman_stare.text: Spiders become dangerous the deeper you go, lest you dwell in the dark...
tip.tipsmod.endermites.text: Campfires and heart lanterns will heal you regardless of your hunger.
tip.tipsmod.fall_damage_blocks.text: Try out customising your avatar in the main menu!
tip.tipsmod.fortress_triangulation.text: Join our support discord if you've got any questions, or suggestions!
tip.tipsmod.four_eggs.text: Ventar are this world's currency, collect enough and you'll be able to trade for various items and materials.
tip.tipsmod.freezing_leather.text: Pet collars can be used on respawn anchors to resurrect your pets.
tip.tipsmod.goat_milk.text: Try using a mechanical press on ingots to get their sheet form.
tip.tipsmod.gravity_torch.text: Press [Button 5] on your mouse to dodge roll.
tip.tipsmod.iron_golem_heal.text: Architect's and Geographer's compass can located any structure or biome respectively.
tip.tipsmod.job_site_dimension.text: The piglins have united under one tribe known as The Order of The Axe.
tip.tipsmod.lava_fuel.text: Forges can make special items such as soul steel and mythril cores.
tip.tipsmod.locked_repeaters.text: Also try Starfell: The Second Knight!
tip.tipsmod.mushroom_biome_spawns.text: Looking at a mob or a block with a spyglass will give you details about said it.
tip.tipsmod.mushroom_placement.text: Mobs drop their souls upon their demise, these soul points can be used for things like enchanting or skills.
tip.tipsmod.nether_lava.text: Illagers of the Iron Covenant drop ventar upon death.
tip.tipsmod.nether_sponge.text: Obelisks can be used for fast travel in exchange for soul points.
tip.tipsmod.nether_travel.text: Mythril Cores can be used to craft obelisks.
tip.tipsmod.note_block_instrument.text: Cutting grass with a knife with yield straw that can be crafted into canvas.
tip.tipsmod.obsidian_formation.text: Looking for a challenge? Try apocalypse+ mode!
tip.tipsmod.ore_tiers.text: A creature is never killed unless their soul is shattered. In time, they will return.
tip.tipsmod.peaceful_tnt.text: Cutting boards typically yield better results when crafting.
tip.tipsmod.piglin_gold.text: Corrupted ravens will swoop down and attack you if you build up too high.
tip.tipsmod.piglin_repellent.text: Umbral shards can be used to craft eyes of shadow, and open up a portal to the abyssal seas.
tip.tipsmod.poison_immune.text: Press [K] to open up your skill tree.
tip.tipsmod.portal_trick.text: Relics and artifacts are magic items that give you unique abilities and buffs.
tip.tipsmod.scrap_nuggets.text: You can mix and match different accessories to create your own personalized builds!
tip.tipsmod.shear_mooshroom.text: Inspired by the likes of Elden Ring, Devil May Cry, and Nine Sols.
tip.tipsmod.sheared_cave_vines.text: Flower crowns make you look even prettier!
tip.tipsmod.shears_dispenser.text: All kinds of creatures now have new variants and looks.
tip.tipsmod.shulker_armor.text: Press [SHIFT] to compare equipment to the piece you currently have equipped.
tip.tipsmod.smoke_bees.text: Use a skillet or a cooking pot to make all new food items.
tip.tipsmod.snow_golem_trail.text: Most items have had their durability buffed.
tip.tipsmod.spider_jockey.text: Hunger has been removed, and food will directly heal you instead.
tip.tipsmod.sponge_bucket.text: Structures with higher difficulties will yield equipment with better statistics and perks than if you crafted them.
tip.tipsmod.string_wool.text: Warding effigies will block enemies from spawning around you depending on how many there are.
tip.tipsmod.swamp_slime.text: Dried ghasts can be found in the nether. Drop them into water to hydrate them.
tip.tipsmod.undead_damage.text: If you're struggling to craft an item, use the recipe viewer to check the recipe.
tip.tipsmod.undead_helmet.text: Blaze royalty, known as wildfires, can be found scarcely in the Netherrealm.
tip.tipsmod.wandering_invis.text: The Nameless King resides in the Netherrealm, travelers say that you can hear whispers if you get close enough to his resting place...
tip.tipsmod.water_grass.text: The great watchtower of Dol'Naer has long since been abandoned, yet they say an infernal wrath stirs atop the ruins...
tip.tipsmod.weather_sleep.text: There are tales of wanderers being eaten by a giant snowy beast in the midst of blizzards.
tip.tipsmod.west.text: Careful when traversing the deserts, lest you awaken the great earth eaters.
tip.tipsmod.witch_conversion.text: Thanks to NineRavens, GrayGravity, Apenaz, SociopathicFungusGirl, Noelledotjpg, Raspmary, CWdotpng, MysterWobble, and my community for their encouragement, inspiration, support, and help making this pack.
